meanings.sent1: The old statue had a patinaed surface.
meanings.sent2: The antique mirror was beautifully patinaed.
meanings.sent3: The patinaed door handle looked like it had stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a patinaed quality, rich with experience.
meanings.sent5: The patinaed copper gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing its age and beauty.

meanings.sent1: The patinaed book had been well-loved over the years.

meanings.sent3: She joked that her patinaed shoes were vintage chic.
meanings.sent4: His patinaed watch was a testament to the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The patinaed furniture added character to the room, telling a silent story of use and care.

meanings.sent1: Over time, the metal will patinaed beautifully.
